| HistoryText             = Born of a warrior society, each member was at least partially robotic. When their race was destroyed they banded together as the Collection Agency, a group of mercenaries. They will perform kidnappings, espionage, and assassinations for a fee. For a while, they worked for the [[Taneleer Tivan (Earth-616)|Collector]] until [[Jude (Collection Agency) (Earth-616)|Jude]]'s apparent death, though Jude's head survived and was seen in a preservation tank.{{r|Silver Surfer Vol 3 61|64}}
